description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，民主进步党籍，现任中华民国副总统。曾任中华民国驻美代表、国家安全会议咨询委员、立法委员等职。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician of the Democratic Progressive Party (DPP), currently serving as the Vice President of the Republic of China. She previously served as the Taiwanese Representative to the United States, an advisor to the National Security Council, and a member of the Legislative Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，民主进步党籍，现任中华民国总统。曾与萧美琴搭档参选2024年总统选举。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician of the Democratic Progressive Party (DPP), currently serving as the President of the Republic of China. He was Hsiao Bi-khim's running mate in the 2024 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，民主进步党籍，曾任中华民国总统。在总统任内任命萧美琴为国家安全会议咨询委员及驻美代表。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician of the Democratic Progressive Party (DPP) who served as the President of the Republic of China. During her presidency, she appointed Hsiao Bi-khim as an advisor to the National Security Council and as the Representative to the United States.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，前花莲县县长。在2020年立法委员选举中击败寻求连任的萧美琴。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and former Magistrate of Hualien County. He defeated Hsiao Bi-khim in the 2020 legislative election.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物。曾在2010年花莲县立委补选中击败萧美琴，后于2016年被萧美琴击败。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician. He defeated Hsiao Bi-khim in the 2010 Hualien County legislative by-election, and was later defeated by her in 2016.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物。在2007年民进党党内初选中击败萧美琴。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician. He defeated Hsiao Bi-khim in the 2007 DPP primary.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任外交部部长。在萧美琴担任驻美代表期间为其上司。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as the Minister of Foreign Affairs. He was Hsiao Bi-khim's superior during her tenure as Representative to the U.S.

description.zh-cn: 萧美琴的父亲，曾任台南神学院院长。
description.en: Father of Hsiao Bi-khim, former president of Tainan Theological College and Seminary.

description.zh-cn: 萧美琴的母亲，欧裔美国人。
description.en: Mother of Hsiao Bi-khim, an American of European descent.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，曾任美国众议院议长。2023年与萧美琴、游锡堃会面。
description.en: American politician, former Speaker of the U.S. House of Representatives. Met with Hsiao Bi-khim and You Si-kun in 2023.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，曾任美国国务卿。2021年与时任驻美代表的萧美琴在双橡园会晤。
description.en: American politician, former U.S. Secretary of State. Met with then-Representative Hsiao Bi-khim at Twin Oaks in 2021.

en: Vice President of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的国家副元首职位。
description.en: The position of the deputy head of state of the Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华民国驻美国大使列表

zh-cn: 中华民国驻美国大使列表
en: List of ambassadors of the Republic of China to the United States
ROC Representative to the United States

description.zh-cn: 中华民国派驻美国的外交代表机构及职位。
description.en: The diplomatic representative office and position of the Republic of China in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国最高立法机关立法院的成员。
description.en: A member of the Legislative Yuan, the highest legislative body of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的主要政党之一，萧美琴为其党员。
description.en: One of the major political parties in the Republic of China, of which Hsiao Bi-khim is a member.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国俄亥俄州的私立文理学院，萧美琴在此获得东亚研究学士学位。
description.en: A private liberal arts college in Ohio, United States, where Hsiao Bi-khim earned her Bachelor's degree in East Asian Studies.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国纽约市的私立研究型大学，萧美琴在此获得政治学硕士学位。
description.en: A private research university in New York City, United States, where Hsiao Bi-khim earned her Master's degree in Political Science.

nodes.id: 中共中央台湾工作办公室

zh-cn: 中共中央台湾工作办公室
en: Taiwan Affairs Office of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 负责处理对台事务的中华人民共和国政府机构，曾点名抨击并制裁萧美琴。
description.en: A government agency of the People's Republic of China responsible for handling Taiwan-related affairs, which has publicly criticized and sanctioned Hsiao Bi-khim.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党，曾将萧美琴列入“台独”份子制裁名单。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China, which has placed Hsiao Bi-khim on a sanctions list for 'Taiwan independence' elements.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国驻捷克大使馆
en: Embassy of the People's Republic of China in the Czech Republic

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在捷克的外交代表机构。其人员曾于2024年3月尾随萧美琴访问捷克的车队。
description.en: The diplomatic mission of the People's Republic of China in the Czech Republic. Its personnel followed Hsiao Bi-khim's convoy during her visit to the Czech Republic in March 2024.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第十六任总统、副总统选举。萧美琴在此次选举中与赖清德搭档并成功当选副总统。
description.en: The 16th presidential and vice-presidential election of the Republic of China. Hsiao Bi-khim ran with Lai Ching-te and was successfully elected Vice President in this election.

description.zh-cn: 2006至2007年间民进党内的政治事件，萧美琴成为深绿支持者围剿的对象之一。
description.en: A political incident within the DPP between 2006 and 2007, during which Hsiao Bi-khim was one of the figures targeted by deep-green supporters.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府发布的制裁名单，萧美琴被列入其中。
description.en: A sanctions list published by the government of the People's Republic of China, on which Hsiao Bi-khim has been included.

description.zh-cn: 位于日本兵库县的城市，是萧美琴的出生地。
description.en: A city in Hyōgo Prefecture, Japan, and the birthplace of Hsiao Bi-khim.

description.zh-cn: 萧清芬是萧美琴的父亲。
description.en: Hsiao Ching-fen is Hsiao Bi-khim's father.

description.zh-cn: 萧邱碧玉是萧美琴的母亲。
description.en: Peggy Cooley is Hsiao Bi-khim's mother.

description.zh-cn: 时任总统蔡英文任命萧美琴为国家安全会议咨询委员，后又指派其为驻美代表。
description.en: Then-President Tsai Ing-wen appointed Hsiao Bi-khim as an advisor to the National Security Council and later as the Representative to the United States.

relationships.target: 中华民国驻美国大使列表

description.zh-cn: 在担任驻美代表期间，萧美琴向时任外交部长吴钊燮汇报。
description.en: During her tenure as Representative to the U.S., Hsiao Bi-khim reported to then-Minister of Foreign Affairs Joseph Wu.

description.zh-cn: 萧美琴曾担任四届中华民国立法委员。
description.en: Hsiao Bi-khim served four terms as a member of the Legislative Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 萧美琴在此次选举中当选为中华民国副总统。
description.en: Hsiao Bi-khim was elected Vice President of the Republic of China in this election.

description.zh-cn: 萧美琴担任赖清德总统任内的副总统。
description.en: Hsiao Bi-khim serves as Vice President under President Lai Ching-te.

description.zh-cn: 赖清德与萧美琴搭档参选2024年中华民国总统、副总统选举。
description.en: Lai Ching-te and Hsiao Bi-khim were running mates in the 2024 ROC presidential and vice-presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 傅崐萁在2020年立法委员选举中击败萧美琴，使其寻求连任失败。
description.en: Fu Kun-chi defeated Hsiao Bi-khim in the 2020 legislative election, preventing her from securing re-election.

description.zh-cn: 王廷升与萧美琴在2010年及2016年的花莲县立法委员选举中互为竞争对手，互有胜负。
description.en: Wang Ting-sheng and Hsiao Bi-khim were political rivals in the 2010 and 2016 Hualien County legislative elections, with each winning one election.

relationships.source: 中共中央台湾工作办公室

description.zh-cn: 在2022年裴洛西访问台湾后，中共中央台办点名抨击萧美琴，并将其列入“台独”顽固分子清单进行制裁。
description.en: After Nancy Pelosi's visit to Taiwan in 2022, the Taiwan Affairs Office of the CPC Central Committee publicly criticized Hsiao Bi-khim and placed her on the "'Taiwan independence' diehard elements" list for sanctions.

description.zh-cn: 在蔡英文与麦卡锡会面后，中国共产党当局宣布对萧美琴实施进一步制裁。
description.en: Following the meeting between Tsai Ing-wen and Kevin McCarthy, the Communist Party of China authorities announced further sanctions against Hsiao Bi-khim.

description.zh-cn: 萧美琴访问捷克期间，其车队遭到中国驻捷克大使馆人员驾车尾随，险酿车祸。
description.en: During Hsiao Bi-khim's visit to the Czech Republic, her convoy was followed by a vehicle driven by personnel from the Chinese embassy, nearly causing an accident.

description.zh-cn: 时任驻美代表的萧美琴在双橡园会晤了前美国国务卿迈克·蓬佩奥。
description.en: Then-Representative to the U.S. Hsiao Bi-khim met with former U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo at Twin Oaks.

description.zh-cn: 萧美琴陪同立法院长游锡堃拜会了时任美国众议院议长凯文·麦卡锡。
description.en: Hsiao Bi-khim accompanied Legislative Yuan President You Si-kun to visit then-U.S. House Speaker Kevin McCarthy.
